de.frankfurt.uni.vcp.gui.controllers
Class MapScreenController

java.lang.Object
  com.jme3.app.state.AbstractAppState
      de.frankfurt.uni.vcp.gui.controllers.AbstractScreenController
          de.frankfurt.uni.vcp.gui.controllers.MapScreenController
All Implemented Interfaces:
com.jme3.app.state.AppState, de.lessvoid.nifty.screen.ScreenController
public class MapScreenController
extends AbstractScreenController

This is the screen controllers used during map setup of the game

This class provides the functionality to select from a given list of maps provided by the game server.

New games can be started with a given name.

Author:
wladimir + saman + bernd
